titleInfo.title: Obelisk of Rameses II, Pylon and Rubble Peristyle Court

mods.abstract: Obelisk of Rameses II, pylon and rubble peristyle court; close up of closed papyrus peristyle court of Rameses II identified by cartouches on lintels and rubble (foreground); pylon and obelisk (background); untitled print, "535" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
